message.raw: change firmware/driver behavior to match what the DRC simulator does: the same joint angles produce the same, but mirrored, grasp, when sent to the left vs right hand. More specifically, the first (abduction/adduction) joints are mirrored on the left hand.

message.raw: remove side-dependent behavior of simple_grasp, since we'll have the first joints of the left hand be mirrored from the right hand, just as in the simulator. this fix can occur in the 'real' hand ROS driver, to contain the amount of code that needs to be hand-specific.
message.html: remove side-dependent behavior of simple_grasp, since we'll have the first joints of the left hand be mirrored from the right hand, just as in the simulator. this fix can occur in the 'real' hand ROS driver, to contain the amount of code that needs to be hand-specific.
